body_html: Does this fix apply to the GPU version of the libraries as well? Specifically, I'm wonder about libtensorflow_jni-gpu-linux-x86_64-1.3.0-rc1.tar.gz. I run out of memory when running with that library on an Nvidia card.
body_text: Does this fix apply to the GPU version of the libraries as well? Specifically, I'm wonder about libtensorflow_jni-gpu-linux-x86_64-1.3.0-rc1.tar.gz. I run out of memory when running with that library on an Nvidia card.
body: Does this fix apply to the GPU version of the libraries as well? Specifically, I'm wonder about `libtensorflow_jni-gpu-linux-x86_64-1.3.0-rc1.tar.gz`. I run out of memory when running with that library on an Nvidia card.
